main event: A civilian observed 5 objects in the sky, possibly a balloon, in Goffstown, New Hampshire on August 6, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 01:12 Z., The course of the objects was from NW to SW., The estimated speed of the objects was approximately 500 MPH., The objects had a diameter of 15-20 feet., The data collected was insufficient to substantiate the sighting.
